info.title: Main Modules
info.description: The official swagger document for the ACP API

post.summary: adds an address to an existing customer
post.description:
In order to access this resource, your application must include one of the following scopes:
Acp
WriteCustomerData

parameters.name: primary
parameters.description: set to true to make this the primary address

parameters.name: validate
parameters.description: set to true to validate the address
